title: 'Keir Starmer is a disaster from start to finish - for the sake of the country, step aside,' Nana Akua blasts
tags: Ex-Ukip leader lashes out at Labour over plans to offer revamped council houses to migrants;Labour warned of mistake that could cost BILLIONS of taxpayer cash ahead of latest backbench revolt;Keir Starmer's allies warn leadership challenge risks economic chaos: 'It would be so irresponsible';The GB News Editorial Charter
